thread.title: Josh

author: Josh
title: Josh
text: Not a horrible course overall. It definitely met it's intended purpose. Which was to educate and prepare me for the test. However, it was extremely repetitive and redundant. I felt like I must have went over the PFD section about 10 times. I don't know if it was designed that way on purpose to meet the mandatory 3 hours required by the state or if it's just bad design. Nevertheless, it drove the point home. Also, there were some typos. There was a portion where they were talking about how towing a person between SUNSET and SUNRISE is not authorized, but the video/graphic showed between SUNRISE and SUNSET. Big difference. Other than that, no major complaints. I passed. What more can you ask for?
